mapper.select: select f_id, f_subject, f_start, f_end,f_use,f_w_left,f_w_top,f_width,f_height,f_comment from tbl_popup where f_id=#{f_id} order by f_id desc
select * from tbl_popup where f_start <= (select now()) and f_end >= (select now()) order by f_id asc
select count(*) from tbl_popup where f_wdate between curdate() - interval 7 day and curdate()
